entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:15 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C

Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
